title: 请教一下如何修改刷怪频率
author: Becod_
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Becod_ 于 2020-2-28 22:59 编辑 

RT，服内刷怪频率奇低
不知道是插件限制了还是没配置对
服务端核心：PaperSpigot-1.12-1618
插件列表：

server.properties
spawn-protection=2
generator-settings=
force-gamemode=false
allow-nether=true
gamemode=0
broadcast-console-to-ops=true
enable-query=false
player-idle-timeout=0
difficulty=3
spawn-monsters=true
op-permission-level=4
pvp=true
snooper-enabled=true
level-type=DEFAULT
hardcore=false
enable-command-block=true
max-players=20
network-compression-threshold=256
resource-pack-sha1=
max-world-size=29999984
server-port=25556
debug=false
server-ip=
spawn-npcs=true
allow-flight=true
level-name=world
view-distance=12
resource-pack=
spawn-animals=true
white-list=false
generate-structures=true
online-mode=false
max-build-height=256
level-seed=
prevent-proxy-connections=false
use-native-transport=true
enable-rcon=false
motd=A Minecraft Server复制代码

bukkit.yml
settings:
  allow-end: true
  warn-on-overload: true
  permissions-file: permissions.yml
  update-folder: update
  plugin-profiling: false
  connection-throttle: 4000
  query-plugins: true
  deprecated-verbose: default
  shutdown-message: 服务器已关闭
spawn-limits:
  monsters: 75
  animals: 12
  water-animals: 2
  ambient: 0
chunk-gc:
  period-in-ticks: 600
  load-threshold: 0
ticks-per:
  animal-spawns: 40
  monster-spawns: 4
  autosave: 6000
aliases: now-in-commands.yml复制代码

spigot.yml
config-version: 11
settings:
  debug: false
  save-user-cache-on-stop-only: false
  sample-count: 12
  bungeecord: false
  late-bind: false
  player-shuffle: 0
  filter-creative-items: true
  user-cache-size: 1000
  int-cache-limit: 1024
  moved-wrongly-threshold: 0.0625
  moved-too-quickly-multiplier: 10.0
  item-dirty-ticks: 20
  timeout-time: 60
  restart-on-crash: false
  restart-script: ./start.sh
  netty-threads: 4
  attribute:
    maxHealth:
      max: 2048.0
    movementSpeed:
      max: 2048.0
    attackDamage:
      max: 2048.0
commands:
  tab-complete: 0
  log: true
  spam-exclusions:
  - /skill
  silent-commandblock-console: false
  replace-commands:
  - setblock
  - summon
  - testforblock
  - tellraw
messages:
  whitelist: 您不在内服成员名单中！
  unknown-command: Unknown command. Type "/help" for help.
  server-full: The server is full!
  outdated-client: Outdated client! Please use {0}
  outdated-server: Outdated server! I'm still on {0}
  restart: Server is restarting
advancements:
  disable-saving: false
  disabled:
  - minecraft:story/disabled
stats:
  disable-saving: false
  forced-stats: {}
world-settings:
  default:
    verbose: true
    growth:

      cane-modifier: 100
      melon-modifier: 100

      monsters: 24
      misc: 2
      water: 6
      tick-inactive-villagers: true
    mob-spawn-range: 3
    entity-tracking-range:
      players: 128
      animals: 32
      monsters: 64
      misc: 12
      other: 32
    ticks-per:

    hopper-amount: 1

    dragon-death-sound-radius: 0

      regen-exhaustion: 12.0

      sprint-multiplier: 0.1
      other-multiplier: 0.0

    max-tick-time:
      tile: 50
      entity: 50
    squid-spawn-range:
      min: 45.0
    item-despawn-rate: 6000
    merge-radius:
      item: 3.5
      exp: 6.0
    view-distance: 12
    arrow-despawn-rate: 1200
    enable-zombie-pigmen-portal-spawns: true
    wither-spawn-sound-radius: 0
    hanging-tick-frequency: 100
    zombie-aggressive-towards-villager: true
    nerf-spawner-mobs: false
    max-entity-collisions: 3复制代码
paper.ymlverbose: false
config-version: 13
settings:
  load-permissions-yml-before-plugins: true
  bungee-online-mode: false

    max-chunk-sends-per-tick: 81
    max-chunk-gens-per-tick: 10

      allow-permanent-chunk-loaders: false
      scan-for-legacy-ender-dragon: true

replies.author: TSR工作室
replies.txt_content:
1.服务端文件夹里面的server.properties里面的
spawn-animals=true 动物生成
difficulty=3 难度调整:困难
spawn-monsters=true 怪物生成
2.服务端文件夹里面的bukkit.yml里面的
animal-spawns: 400  动物生成
monster-spawns: 1  怪物生成
限制实体生成
monsters: 70
animals: 15
water-animals: 5
ambient: 15
3.如果有多世界插件
/mv modify set difficulty 3 设置当前世界为困难模式

replies.author: Becod_
replies.txt_content:
TSR工作室 发表于 2020-2-28 22:51
1.服务端文件夹里面的server.properties里面的
spawn-animals=true 动物生成
difficulty=3 难度调整:困难
配置文件已给出，里边的怪物生成设置设置得比你给出得要高，但是还是慢

replies.author: TSR工作室
replies.txt_content:
Becod_ 发表于 2020-2-28 22:57
配置文件已给出，里边的怪物生成设置设置得比你给出得要高，但是还是慢 ...
有可能是优化插件限制了服务器刷怪数量 可以把优化插件拿出来开服试试刷怪效果

replies.author: Becod_
replies.txt_content:
TSR工作室 发表于 2020-2-28 22:59
有可能是优化插件限制了服务器刷怪数量 可以把优化插件拿出来开服试试刷怪效果 ...
只有一个优化插件：SAML
用来在低tps时清理部分生物，但是服务器从tps未低于19

replies.author: Becod_
replies.txt_content:
Mcxixif 发表于 2020-2-29 11:28
可以参照https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-478126-1-1.html
请问看完回复了吗？
服务器TPS从未低过19，也就根本不需要优化
我现在只想把怪物的生成频率提高来
